sql-script.name: Complaint
sql-script.tran-sql:
it_complaint
CREATE TABLE `it_complaint` ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL, `refModule` tinyint(4) NOT NULL, `complaint` tinyint(4) NOT NULL, `content` text , `createdate` datetime NOT NULL, `dealDate` datetime NOT NULL, `userId` bigint(11) NOT NULL, `refId` bigint(20) NOT NULL, `deal` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `dealContent` text , PRIMARY KEY (`id`) )
